item.title: Tree to high, 3rd August
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam I Mrs Trotman am writing to you about the tree outside my house on the main road. On Silverdale road as to high as branchs catching phone lines and over hanging the footpath. Please can you do something about it many thanks Mrs Trotman.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Silverdale Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken and missing road name sign, 3rd August
item.description:
This has been reported before but never fixed the sign this end of Gainsborough square is missing and the other end is broken. Can they both be replace please as been like this for well over a year. First reported Jan 24 (broken sign) a couple of months later the other one was taken away but nothing since?? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hanover Way, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plums dropping into garden, 3rd August
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daubeney Road, Hackney, London
